global.q: What is a USCIS medical exam (Form I-693)?
global.a: It is a required immigration medical examination completed by an authorized civil surgeon.

global.q: Who is allowed to perform an I-693 exam?
global.a: Only USCIS-designated civil surgeons may complete the exam.

global.q: How much does an I-693 exam usually cost?
global.a: Costs vary by provider and services included.

global.q: How long is the I-693 form valid?
global.a: Validity periods are set by USCIS and may change over time.

global.q: What documents are needed for the exam?
global.a: Identification, vaccination records, and USCIS forms are typically required.

global.q: Are vaccinations included in the exam cost?
global.a: Some clinics include vaccines; others charge separately.

global.q: How long does the exam process take?
global.a: Timing depends on tests required and record completeness.
USCIS requires sealed envelopes for submission.

global.q: Does this site recommend civil surgeons?
global.a: No. This site is informational only.
Policies vary by provider and USCIS rules.

city.q: Where can I get an I-693 exam near me in {{marketLabel}}?
city.a: Search for USCIS-designated civil surgeons serving {{marketLabel}}.

city.q: Do civil surgeons in {{marketLabel}} offer same-week appointments?
city.a: Availability varies by clinic and demand.

city.q: How much does the exam cost in {{marketLabel}}?
city.a: Pricing depends on provider fees and required services.

city.q: What should I bring to my appointment in {{marketLabel}}?
city.a: Bring identification, forms, and vaccination records.

city.q: How long until I receive my sealed envelope in {{marketLabel}}?
city.a: Timing varies based on test results and clinic processing.
Some clinics perform labs on-site; others refer externally.

city.q: Can I use prior vaccination records in {{marketLabel}}?
city.a: Providers review records to determine needed updates.

city.q: Is follow-up required after the exam in {{marketLabel}}?
city.a: Follow-up depends on findings and USCIS requirements.

city.q: How do I verify a civil surgeon in {{stateName}}?
city.a: Use the official USCIS civil surgeon locator.

city.q: What happens if I miss a required vaccine?
city.a: Providers will advise on next steps to meet USCIS criteria.
